name: Mega Man Rocks!
storyline: The creator, Eric Ruth, has been kidnapped by the evil Dr. Wily. Mega Man must defeat his 8 robot masters and save Eric Ruth.
summary: Mega Man Rocks! is a Mega Man fan game created by Eric Ruth via Game Maker and released in April 2009. This game is slightly different from regular Mega Man games, for example, Mega Man can crouch to avoid enemy attacks. Some of the Robot Masters are immune to an uncharged buster shot, making things slightly more complicated.
